short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Bitcoin wallet which runs in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An secure and easy to use bitcoin wallet which runs in your browser.

 * Client Side Encryption *
 All wallets are encrypted client side using javascript providing protection from server side hacking.

 * Free *
 No additional transaction fees. A bitcoin network fee may apply, but is optional.

* Open Source *
All code related to the wallet service is open source.

* Currency Conversion * 
Live Market Prices in 22 currencies.

* Offline Interface * 
Using html5 offline storage wallets can be viewed offline.
